cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.name: Name
legalNotice.servicesDescription: Our law office provides legal services in the following areas:
legalNotice.disclaimerText1: The information provided on this website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. Personal consultation is required for specific legal questions.
legalNotice.disclaimerText2: Our law office assumes no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided on the website.
legalNotice.intellectualPropertyText: The content of this website, including texts, images, logos, and other materials, is the intellectual property of the law office. Use of the content is only possible with prior written permission.
legalNotice.contactText: For legal questions, please contact us at the above contact information or use our contact form.

impressum.title: Imprint
impressum.servicesDescription: Our law office provides legal services in the following areas:
impressum.termsText1: Legal services are provided in accordance with Hungarian attorney regulations. Service fees are determined according to the fee payment guidelines recommended by the Hungarian Bar Association.
impressum.termsText2: For specific cases, fees and payment terms are agreed upon separately.
impressum.dataProtectionText: The law office's data processing activities are regulated by GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679) and Hungarian data protection laws. You can find our detailed privacy policy here.
impressum.contactText: To use our legal services, please contact us at the above contact information or use our contact form.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or use the links below to navigate to a different page.
notFound.searchSuggestion: Can't find what you're looking for?

home.title: Dr. Szomor Zsófia Anna LL.M.
home.subtitle: Attorney, Transportation Law Specialist
home.helpDescription: Feel free to contact me if you need professional, efficient, and precise legal assistance in criminal law, corporate procedures, real estate transactions/gifts, and family law.
home.servicesTitle: Personalized Legal Services Tailored to Your Needs
home.servicesDescription: In my legal practice, I provide comprehensive professional legal assistance in criminal law, corporate procedures, real estate law, family law, and international law. I handle every case with personalized attention and dedication.
home.criminalDefenseSubtitle: Effective representation from the start of investigation
home.criminalDefenseText: I represent my clients in every stage of criminal proceedings, legally and empathetically – to ensure fair proceedings from investigation to final judgment.
home.victimRepresentationSubtitle: Enforcement of rights in criminal proceedings
home.victimRepresentationText: I help with formulating complaints, representing before authorities, and enforcing compensation claims within the legal framework.
home.witnessSupportText: Legal representation and preparation of witnesses for hearings, informing them of their rights and obligations, and protection against unlawful procedures.
home.ctaDescription: Have a question or need legal assistance? Feel free to contact me by email or phone – I will respond soon.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Dr. Szomor Zsófia Anna LL.M. is an attorney specialized in criminal law and transportation law, with several years of experience in legal representation.
about.description2: Throughout my professional career, I primarily deal with criminal law cases, with particular attention to traffic offenses. My goal is to provide the best possible legal representation for every client.
about.valuesTitle: Professionalism, Empathy, and Commitment for Your Interests
about.clientCenteredText: Your legal case is not just a case – it's a human story to me. In my work, I always prioritize the client's perspective and interests.
about.communicationText: It's important to me that my clients understand every step clearly. I help them in decision-making with open, clear communication.
about.excellenceText: I perform my work with high professional standards. My goal is for my clients to receive the best possible legal representation in every case.
about.dedicatedTitle: Dedicated Legal Support with Expertise and Humanity
about.dedicatedText: I completed my legal studies at the University of Szeged Faculty of Law and Political Science, with a specialization in criminal law. Following this, I worked for more than three years as a legal trainee in a Budapest law firm, where I gained extensive practical experience in addition to my theoretical knowledge in various legal areas. During this time, I also obtained a transportation law specialist qualification at the Pázmány Péter Catholic University. In my legal practice, I strive to provide professional, precise, and empathetic legal support to my clients. In my work, I place special emphasis on reliability, dedication, and effective communication, especially in criminal law, corporate procedures, real estate transactions, and family law cases.
about.testimonialsSubtitle: Our clients' opinion about the quality of my work
about.testimonial1: Dr. Szomor Zsófia Anna's professional and empathetic approach impressed me. I received excellent representation in my criminal case, and she clearly explained every step.
about.testimonial2: After a traffic accident, I was able to receive appropriate compensation with Dr. Szomor's help. Her expertise and persistence were exemplary.
about.faqSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our legal services and consultation procedures.
about.faq1Question: What legal services do you offer?
about.faq1Answer: I provide comprehensive legal representation in criminal, family, corporate, and real estate law cases, as well as representation before the European Court of Human Rights. For detailed information, please see the Services section.
about.faq2Answer: I am available by phone, email, or in person. You can find my contact information on the homepage. Feel free to contact me with any questions!
about.faq3Answer: A consultation is an initial meeting where we review your legal situation and examine how I can help. It also provides an opportunity to receive personalized advice. Consultations take place at pre-arranged times.
about.faq4Question: How long does a legal consultation take?
about.faq4Answer: A consultation typically takes 45-60 minutes, which provides sufficient time to discuss the case in detail, explore legal options, and plan the next steps.
about.faq5Question: What should you bring to the consultation?
about.faq5Answer: Please bring documents related to your case, such as contracts, court decisions, or identification documents. These help me provide the most accurate advice possible.
about.moreQuestionsText: Feel free to contact me at my contact information

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive legal services tailored to your individual needs.
services.europeanCourtTitle: Representation before the European Court of Human Rights
services.europeanCourtDescription1: Proceedings before the European Court of Human Rights require special expertise and experience. Dr. Szomor Zsófia Anna LL.M. undertakes to represent her clients at this international forum, ensuring that their rights are enforced at an international level.
services.europeanCourtDescription2: I provide comprehensive support from the preparation of the application to the conduct of court proceedings, whether it concerns human rights violations or the review of Hungarian authority decisions.
services.corporateTitle: Corporate Formation and Modification with Legal Support
services.corporateDescription1: My law office provides comprehensive legal support for corporate formation, transformation, registered office changes, management changes, and other corporate legal changes.
services.corporateDescription2: During the process, I place special emphasis on legal compliance and the rapid processing of matters.
services.corporateDescription3: Whether it's starting a new business or reorganizing an existing company, I help in making the right decisions and smooth processing.
services.criminalDescription1: I strive for comprehensive legal representation of my clients during criminal proceedings, from the investigative stage through court hearings to possible appeals. I place special emphasis on ensuring that my clients' rights are fully enforced at every stage.
services.criminalDescription2: Whether it's victim rights enforcement or defendant defense, my goal is for the procedure to be transparent, humane, and fair for everyone involved. My experience extends to juvenile criminal cases, special procedures, and European human rights aspects as well.
services.criminalSpecialtyText: Thanks to my transportation law specialist qualification, I place special emphasis on traffic offenses, including endangering road traffic, drunk driving, and serious traffic accidents.
services.comprehensiveTitle: Comprehensive Legal Support for Every Life Situation
services.comprehensiveSubtitle: I have designed my legal services to provide effective solutions to challenges arising in criminal law, corporate procedures, real estate law, and family law.
services.criminalDefenseServiceDescription: Comprehensive defense during investigation and court proceedings, as well as legal support for victims and witnesses in criminal proceedings.
services.familyLawServiceDescription: Divorce, parental custody, marital property agreements, child support, and property division – always keeping the family's interests in mind.
services.corporateServiceDescription: Legal support and document preparation for corporate formation, change registration, and related matters.
services.realEstateServiceDescription: Contract preparation, legal advice, and comprehensive processing for residential and commercial real estate transfers.

realestate.title: Real Estate Purchase and Gift
realestate.paragraph1: I undertake the complete legal preparation and processing of real estate purchase and gift contracts, whether it's an apartment, house, or plot. I accompany my clients through every step of the process: from contract conclusion to real estate registration entry.
realestate.paragraph2: I place special emphasis on ensuring that legal documents are secure and clear for all parties – thus avoiding potential future disputes.
realestate.paragraph3: My expertise covers residential and commercial real estate transactions, ensuring smooth and legally compliant processes for all parties involved.
realestate.imageAlt: Real estate legal services - property contracts and legal documentation

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: I am happy to be available for any legal question or consultation. Contact me at one of the following contact details!
contact.contactSubtitle: Client reception is only by prior appointment. Feel free to contact me with any legal question!
